description: 2 vols.-vol. 1: through kitāb al-jihād, ff. 345. 262 x 183; 220 x 140 mm. 33 lin. Rabīʻ I, 906 - vol. 2: kitāb badʼ al-khalq through kitāb al-iʻtiṣām bi-al-sunnah, ff. 334. 313 x 207; 200 x 138 mm. 29 lin. Rajab 966. Commentary on al-Bukhārīʼs collection: Brockelmann, GAL, I, 165 (commentary 11). Incip.: ... الحمد لله المرشد الى الجامع الصحىح ... وبعد فلما کان کتاب الجامع
